meta.title: WebpWizard - Free Online Image Converter | WebP, PNG, JPG
meta.description: Convert images to WebP, PNG, or JPG instantly. Free, fast, and 100% private - all processing happens in your browser. No uploads, no waiting.
meta.keywords: image converter, WebP converter, PNG to WebP, JPG to WebP, bulk image converter, free image tool

header.description: Convert to WebP, PNG, or JPG — Fast & private

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. No uploads, no waiting.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device. No servers, no tracking, no worries.

batch.description: Convert multiple images at once and download them as a single ZIP file.

footer.privacy: All conversions happen locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to any server.

meta.title: About WebpWizard - Free Online Image Converter
meta.description: Learn about WebpWizard, the free online image converter that prioritizes your privacy. Convert WebP, PNG, and JPG files locally in your browser.

about.title: About WebpWizard
about.subtitle: Fast, free, and private image conversion

whatIs.title: What is WebpWizard?
whatIs.description: WebpWizard is a free online image converter that runs entirely in your browser. Unlike other converters, we don't upload your images to any server - all processing happens locally on your device.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device. No server uploads, no data collection.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Convert images instantly with no upload or download wait times.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: No subscriptions, no hidden fees, no account required.

batch.title: Batch Conversion
batch.description: Convert multiple images at once and download as a ZIP file.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: We use modern web technologies to process images directly in your browser:

about.step1: Upload your images (drag & drop or click to browse)
about.step2: Choose output format (WebP, PNG, or JPG), quality, and size

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: WebpWizard is open source software. You can check the code on GitHub.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - WebpWizard
meta.description: WebpWizard privacy policy. Learn how we protect your privacy - all image processing happens locally in your browser.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At WebpWizard, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we handle your data.

noDataCollection.title: No Data Collection
noDataCollection.description: All image processing happens locally in your browser. Your images are NEVER uploaded to our servers or any third-party service.

analytics.title: Anonymous Analytics
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to understand how people use our site. This data is anonymous and doesn't include any personal information or image data.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use minimal cookies for analytics only. No tracking cookies are used.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use Google Analytics for anonymous usage statistics. No other third-party services have access to your data.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: Since we don't collect personal data, there's nothing to request or delete. Your images never leave your device.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our GitHub repository.

meta.title: Terms & Conditions - WebpWizard
meta.description: WebpWizard terms and conditions. Free online image converter with no registration required.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: By using WebpWizard, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, please don't use this service.

service.title: The Service
service.description: WebpWizard is a free online image converter that converts images between WebP, PNG, and JPG formats. The service is provided 'as is' without any warranties.

noAccount.title: No Registration Required
noAccount.description: You don't need to create an account to use our service. No personal information is required.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.description: While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee that all conversions will be perfect. Always keep backups of your original images.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: You retain all rights to your images. We don't claim any ownership of content you process through our service.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: WebpWizard and its creators shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of changes.
